title: odunybiz
author: odunybiz
created_time: September 13, 2023, 12:10:54 PMLast edit: September 14, 2023, 11:55:37 AM by odunybiz
content: Scammers are all over the world and they keep using different method everyday to scam people. In Nigeria, most people have fall victim in one way or the other. Let's share our most painful scam here for others to learn and to avoid people from from falling into such scam. Below is my most painful scam:ðŸ‘‰ðŸ‘‰This happened like 5 years ago, as a sport gambler, I got carried away by a Facebook advert that promise to give a fixed match. After seen some of their fake match winnings, I decided to subscribe. During subscription, I mistakenly made double payment. What made it painful is that I made payment twice to this guy after which I discovered they are scammers.ðŸ‘‰ðŸ‘‰I was introduced to crime alert by a friend. Crime alert is a branch of DHIL company that promise 30% returns on monthly basis on any money you invested with them. After much pressure by my friend, I decided to make some finding about them. I observed this with my findingsðŸ’¯They are registered company under Nigeria governmentðŸ’¯They have a famous, reliable,humble and honest person as one of their ambassador.ðŸ’¯They claim to fight crimeðŸ’¯They do things to support people's security e.g they bought patrol cars for police.ðŸ’¯They have been paying for years.All the above points prompt me to later invest in it. These are my prove of investment.Â Immediately after I invested, story start changing and it was later discovered to be a scam.CONCLUSIONScammer always look around for loop holes that can easily attract people to fall into their traps. They then sit down and take their time to perfect their plans. At this time where inflation is high and no much money in circulation, one needs to be very careful not to fall into their traps.

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: There is something myself do believe is that whatever that appears to be too real are likely to be scam, since I got this mentality I don't quickly falls into scammer's hand, and again do not be too desperate to make gain or being enticed by their profits I think is this point peoples fails to understand they could easily get trapped alone the line. Try to reduce your anxiety to make wealth or to become rich over night, I think one that causes this is whenever you looking at somethings and said "oh my God" this is a life changing opportunity then just remembered that this is scam falling opportunities at this point you may mind how fast and quickly you wanted to invest that site or platform. In general term, know that nothing good comes so easily whenever people promised you something first think what could be their benefits for doing such thing or for offering you something at a very cheap rate, then you will remember that there is something phishing around such things, do not allowed greed to engulf you so easily and quickly without having to think twice.

comments.author: EluguHcman
comments.body: The honest truth is that when you have adopted gambling as a means of survival, greed is always involved and whatever greed is involved is tantamount to be doomed contrarily.... If you have much risk in gambling, it has the potential to earn goldly if you succeeds but has high level of risk.Talking about scammed, you can only bypass being scammed if and only you don't believe what you did not work for will cherishly enrich you to a success.Conclusion, take greed out of you and you would overcome being scammed because the enticements in the scamming system is magnetically magical to the victims.You can prevent this by a total avoidance of enticements and sugarcoated means to a quick and broad enrichment.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: As I d hear different stories of how scammers d scam people of Nigeria, I began to d ask questions whether na Nigeria na wia dia eyes and focus dey so. This is so appalling that each passing year, we go d hear different method of how scammers d scam people for our country and go scot-free without tracing them. This scams happening gats to put to a stop and people should learn how d no go d move by return of investment. Na for this our country you go hear or see different manner of scam strategy wey scammers d display just to lure people to invest with them, which at the end dem go disappear with peoples money. In the long run another scamming format go still come out and we Nigerians go hype and invest on am, forgetting our past Â experiences of how the scam us. Wetin I understand from this scam of a thing be sae, once you get big eye for money, there is every possibility sae you go fall in the hands of scammers someday.As I d so, I am yet to experience any scam stuff for my side cos I am not easily carried away by that their yeye returns of investing this amount and get this amount in soso time. D small money wey I d get the enough for me and I am not ready to risk am for peso hand no matter how the offer d so.
